resources.string: Add an item to your list!

TIPS FOR SHOPTIMIZE
 Below is the list of stores you can keep lists for
 Your lists keep track of items you buy!
 We keep track items in our database
 
 If you have a coupon:
 press the camera icon for that item
 take a picture of the barcode to show in the store.
 At the end of your store trip you can view all your coupons!
 
 When you arrive at the store:
 Press the Shoptimize button at the bottom of that list
 You will see a map with points of your items
 Use the buttons to update the map as you make you way
 Show your coupons at the end, see the savings!
 
 Thanks for choosing SHOPTIMIZE!
